        public void acceptConnections()
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: Server
        Starts waiting for incoming connection attempts.
        Does block the calling thread until the server is shutdown or any exception occurs.

      • shutdown

        public boolean shutdown()
        Description copied from interface: Server
        Attempts to close all registered Connections and stop accepting connections.
        The Server.acceptConnections() method can still be called to start the server functionality again.
        Specified by:
        shutdown in interface Server
        Returns:
        Whether or not the server has been shut down correctly.
